channel.title: Server compiler help
channel.description:
i have jdk and jre but when i try to compile it just does not work..says i dont have java installed but i instaled both of them i have the newest version to...
can some one please help me... ps.. is a 317 client

item.title: Server compiler help
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

please post your current compile code… it should look like this

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

post yours and what jdk you have

Read full topic
